name: Singapore
notes: Global fintech hub. Very efficient immigration. High salaries but expensive. Strong tech scene. Good for building Asia network.

visa_types.name: Employment Pass (EP)
visa_types.description: For professionals, managers, and executives. Main work visa for tech workers.
requirements: Job offer with minimum salary $5,000/month (higher for experienced)
visa_types.duration: Up to 2 years (renewable up to 3 years)
visa_types.path_to_pr: Can apply for PR after 6 months, typically approved after 2+ years
visa_types.spouse_work_rights: Dependent Pass needs separate work authorization
tips: Tech companies often meet COMPASS requirements
Contribute to CPF for stronger PR case

visa_types.name: S Pass
visa_types.description: For mid-level skilled workers. Lower salary threshold than EP.
visa_types.path_to_pr: Can apply, but EP holders preferred
tips: Consider upgrading to EP when eligible

visa_types.name: Tech.Pass
visa_types.description: For established tech entrepreneurs and leaders.
requirements: One of: Led tech company valued at $500M+, Led significant product development, Key experience at top tech company
Salary of at least $22,500/month in last 1 year
tips: Can start and work for multiple companies

visa_types.name: EntrePass
visa_types.description: For entrepreneurs starting innovative businesses in Singapore.
requirements: Company is VC-funded, or incubator-backed, or you have strong track record
tips: Need to meet renewal criteria (jobs, revenue)
